page.title: 05DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: I woke up at 8.00am relieved there was no school and I read until it was time to get up,then I got up,then I got washed, and dressed and made my bed. I went down for breakfast,of Weetabix, tea and toast,after which I took the dog,Hoagy, a{Springer Spaniel,}for a walk to buy some potatoes. When I got home I finished the last of my French homework,then I played on my computer till lunch.After lunch I went to see a football match ({Totenham {Hotspur}v{Everton}) with my dad. We went in his car_a Citreon BX. When we got back from football, I had my dinner of turkey breasts, potatoes and peas, and went to swimming gala at {Hatfield,}I was representing Ware Swimming Club and won 2 of my races one of which was 2 lengths backstroke. Then we went home. I went to bed at 10.30pm
